metadata.name: Tournament Overlay
metadata.author: JoanJuan10
metadata.description: Plantilla inmersiva para espectadores con estilo profesional - Compatible con inyección DOM v2

customCSS: /* ===== OCULTAR ELEMENTOS NATIVOS ===== */ table.profile, .mainContent table.profile, table.profile[id^='user'] { display: none !important; visibility: hidden !important; height: 0 !important; margin: 0 !important; padding: 0 !important; overflow: hidden !important; } #enemyAvatar, #yourAvatar, img.avatar { display: none !important; visibility: hidden !important; } .timer, div.timer, .mainContent .timer { display: none !important; visibility: hidden !important; } #history, #game-history { display: none !important; visibility: hidden !important; } #btn-config, #btn-exit, .btn-dustpile { display: none !important; visibility: hidden !important; } /* ===== LAYOUT PRINCIPAL ===== */ .mainContent { flex-direction: column !important; align-items: center !important; justify-content: center !important; padding: 10px 20px !important; box-sizing: border-box !important; } #phase2 { display: flex !important; flex-direction: column !important; align-items: center !important; gap: 0.5rem !important; position: relative !important; } #board { position: relative !important; z-index: 1 !important; } /* ===== CONTENEDOR PRINCIPAL ===== */ #uc-tournament-view { font-family: 'Rajdhani', 'Roboto Condensed', sans-serif; pointer-events: none; position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; z-index: 9999; } #uc-tournament-view * { pointer-events: auto; box-sizing: border-box; } /* ===== PANELES DE JUGADOR (mismo ancho que el board: 496px) ===== */ .tv-player-info, .tv-opponent-info { background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(10, 14, 26, 0.95), rgba(26, 31, 46, 0.95)) !important; padding: 0.75rem 1.25rem !important; border-radius: 8px !important; border: 2px solid rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.5) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6), 0 0 15px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.2) !important; width: 858px !important; min-width: 858px !important; max-width: 858px !important; margin: 0 auto !important; display: flex !important; flex-direction: row !important; flex-wrap: nowrap !important; align-items: center !important; justify-content: space-between !important; gap: 1rem !important; transition: all 0.3s ease !important; } .tv-player-info.active-turn, .tv-opponent-info.active-turn { border-color: #00ff88 !important; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2), rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.15)) !important; box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.6), inset 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.15) !important; animation: activePulse 2s ease-in-out infinite !important; } @keyframes activePulse { 0%, 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.6), inset 0 0 20px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.15); } 50% { box-shadow: 0 0 40px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.8), inset 0 0 30px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.2); } } /* ===== NOMBRE DEL JUGADOR ===== */ .tv-player-name { font-size: 1.25rem !important; font-weight: 900 !important; color: white !important; text-transform: uppercase !important; letter-spacing: 1px !important; text-shadow: 0 0 12px var(--tv-accent-color), 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9) !important; white-space: nowrap !important; flex-shrink: 1 !important; overflow: hidden !important; text-overflow: ellipsis !important; max-width: 140px !important; } /* ===== ALMA ===== */ .tv-player-soul { display: inline-flex !important; align-items: center !important; flex-shrink: 0 !important; } .tv-soul-image { width: 28px !important; height: 28px !important; filter: drop-shadow(0 0 6px var(--tv-accent-color)) drop-shadow(0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)) !important; } /* ===== HP ===== */ .tv-player-hp { display: flex !important; align-items: center !important; gap: 0.5rem !important; flex-shrink: 0 !important; } .tv-hp-bar { width: 120px !important; height: 14px !important; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7) !important; border: 2px solid rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.6) !important; border-radius: 7px !important; overflow: hidden !important; position: relative !important; box-shadow: inset 0 2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8), 0 0 8px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.3) !important; } .tv-hp-fill { height: 100% !important; background: linear-gradient(90deg, #ff0066 0%, #ff3366 50%, #ff6699 100%) !important; transition: width 0.5s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) !important; position: relative !important; box-shadow: 0 0 12px rgba(255, 51, 102, 0.7), inset 0 -2px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important; } .tv-hp-fill::before { content: '' !important; position: absolute !important; top: 0 !important; left: 0 !important; right: 0 !important; height: 50% !important; background: linear-gradient(180deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.25) 0%, transparent 100%) !important; } .tv-hp-text { font-size: 1.4rem !important; font-weight: 900 !important; color: white !important; text-shadow: 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9), 0 0 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) !important; white-space: nowrap !important; } /* ===== ORO ===== */ .tv-player-gold { display: inline-flex !important; align-items: center !important; flex-shrink: 0 !important; } .tv-gold-text { font-size: 1.5rem !important; font-weight: 900 !important; color: #ffd700 !important; text-shadow: 0 0 8px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.6), 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9) !important; white-space: nowrap !important; } /* ===== ARTEFACTOS ===== */ .tv-player-artifacts { display: flex !important; align-items: center !important; gap: 0.25rem !important; flex-shrink: 0 !important; } .tv-artifact-image { width: 32px !important; height: 32px !important; filter: drop-shadow(0 0 5px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.4)) drop-shadow(0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8)) !important; transition: all 0.2s ease !important; } .tv-artifact-image:hover { transform: scale(1.15) !important; filter: drop-shadow(0 0 10px rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.8)) drop-shadow(0 3px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9)) !important; } /* ===== CONTADORES DE CARTAS ===== */ .tv-player-cards { display: flex !important; gap: 0.75rem !important; flex-shrink: 0 !important; } .tv-card-counter { display: flex !important; flex-direction: column !important; align-items: center !important; } .tv-card-counter-label { color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) !important; text-transform: uppercase !important; letter-spacing: 0.5px !important; font-weight: 700 !important; font-size: 1rem !important; } .tv-card-counter-value { font-size: 1.5rem !important; font-weight: 900 !important; color: white !important; text-shadow: 0 2px 3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) !important; } /* ===== INDICADOR DE TURNO (izquierda del tablero, centrado) ===== */ .tv-center-info { position: fixed !important; left: calc(50% - 520px) !important; top: calc(50% - 140px) !important; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(10, 14, 26, 0.95), rgba(26, 31, 46, 0.95)) !important; padding: 1rem 1.25rem !important; border-radius: 10px !important; border: 2px solid rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.6) !important; box-shadow: 0 0 20px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.5), 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important; z-index: 10 !important; } .tv-turn-indicator { display: flex !important; flex-direction: column !important; align-items: center !important; gap: 0.5rem !important; } .tv-turn-label { font-size: 0.875rem !important; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important; text-transform: uppercase !important; letter-spacing: 2px !important; font-weight: 700 !important; } .tv-turn-number { font-size: 3rem !important; font-weight: 900 !important; color: var(--tv-accent-color) !important; text-shadow: 0 0 20px var(--tv-accent-color), 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.9) !important; line-height: 1 !important; } .tv-turn-timer { font-size: 1.5rem !important; color: #ffd700 !important; font-weight: 900 !important; text-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8) !important; } .tv-turn-timer.low { color: #ff3366 !important; animation: timerPulse 1s ease-in-out infinite !important; } @keyframes timerPulse { 0%, 100% { transform: scale(1); opacity: 1; } 50% { transform: scale(1.1); opacity: 0.8; } } /* ===== HISTORIAL DE ACCIONES (flotante) ===== */ .tv-action-log { position: fixed !important; top: 80px !important; right: 15px !important; width: 400px !important; max-height: calc(100vh - 100px) !important; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(10, 14, 26, 0.95), rgba(26, 31, 46, 0.95)) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important; border: 2px solid rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.4) !important; border-radius: 12px !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 24px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.3), 0 2px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) !important; transition: transform 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1), opacity 0.3s ease !important; z-index: 6 !important; } .tv-action-log.collapsed { transform: translateX(420px) !important; opacity: 0 !important; pointer-events: none !important; } .tv-log-header { background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.15), rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.08)) !important; padding: 1rem 1.25rem !important; border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.4) !important; display: flex !important; justify-content: space-between !important; align-items: center !important; border-radius: 10px 10px 0 0 !important; } .tv-log-header span { font-size: 1.7rem !important; font-weight: 900 !important; color: var(--tv-accent-color) !important; text-transform: uppercase !important; letter-spacing: 2px !important; text-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--tv-accent-color) !important; } .tv-log-toggle { background: rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.15) !important; border: 2px solid rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.5) !important; color: var(--tv-accent-color) !important; width: 32px !important; height: 32px !important; border-radius: 6px !important; cursor: pointer !important; font-size: 1.25rem !important; font-weight: 900 !important; transition: all 0.2s ease !important; display: flex !important; align-items: center !important; justify-content: center !important; } .tv-log-toggle:hover { background: var(--tv-accent-color) !important; color: var(--tv-primary-color) !important; transform: scale(1.05) !important; box-shadow: 0 0 15px var(--tv-accent-color) !important; } .tv-log-content { padding: 1rem !important; overflow-y: auto !important; max-height: calc(100vh - 180px) !important; } .tv-log-content::-webkit-scrollbar { width: 8px !important; } .tv-log-content::-webkit-scrollbar-track { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important; border-radius: 4px !important; } .tv-log-content::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb { background: rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.5) !important; border-radius: 4px !important; } .tv-log-content::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover { background: var(--tv-accent-color) !important; } .tv-log-entry { padding: 0.75rem 1rem !important; margin-bottom: 0.5rem !important; border-radius: 8px !important; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4) !important; border-left: 4px solid rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.6) !important; font-size: 1.1rem !important; line-height: 1.5 !important; color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.95) !important; transition: all 0.15s ease !important; } .tv-log-entry:hover { background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6) !important; border-left-color: #00ff88 !important; box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.3) !important; transform: translateX(-4px) !important; } .tv-log-entry img { width: 20px !important; height: 20px !important; vertical-align: middle !important; margin: 0 3px !important; } .tv-log-entry-turn { border-left-color: #ffd700 !important; background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.1) !important; font-weight: 900 !important; font-size: 1rem !important; } .tv-log-entry-damage { border-left-color: #ff3366 !important; background: rgba(255, 51, 102, 0.08) !important; } .tv-log-entry-heal { border-left-color: #00ff88 !important; background: rgba(0, 255, 136, 0.08) !important; } .tv-log-entry-artifact { border-left-color: #ffd700 !important; background: rgba(255, 215, 0, 0.08) !important; } /* ===== BOTÓN FLOTANTE DEL LOG ===== */ .tv-log-float-toggle { position: fixed !important; top: 80px !important; right: 20px !important; width: 48px !important; height: 48px !important; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.9), rgba(0, 184, 230, 0.9)) !important; border: 3px solid rgba(10, 14, 26, 0.8) !important; border-radius: 50% !important; color: white !important; font-size: 1.5rem !important; cursor: pointer !important; box-shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.6), 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5) !important; z-index: 7 !important; transition: all 0.25s ease !important; display: flex !important; align-items: center !important; justify-content: center !important; font-weight: 900 !important; } .tv-log-float-toggle:hover { transform: scale(1.15) !important; box-shadow: 0 6px 24px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.8), 0 3px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6) !important; } /* ===== NOTIFICACIONES ===== */ .tv-notification { position: fixed !important; top: 425px !important; left: 19% !important; transform: translateX(-50%) !important; padding: 1rem 2rem !important; border-radius: 10px !important; background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.95), rgba(0, 184, 230, 0.95)) !important; backdrop-filter: blur(10px) !important; color: white !important; font-weight: 700 !important; font-size: 1.125rem !important; box-shadow: 0 8px 32px rgba(0, 217, 255, 0.6), 0 4px 16px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6) !important; z-index: 10 !important; max-width: 600px !important; text-align: center !important; letter-spacing: 1px !important; text-transform: uppercase !important; border: 2px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3) !important; animation: notificationSlide 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1) !important; } @keyframes notificationSlide { from { opacity: 0; transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-20px); } to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(0); } } /* ===== RESPONSIVE ===== */ @media (max-width: 1400px) { .tv-center-info { left: 20px !important; transform: translateY(-50%) !important; } } @media (max-width: 1200px) { .tv-player-info, .tv-opponent-info { width: 450px !important; min-width: 450px !important; max-width: 450px !important; padding: 0.6rem 1rem !important; } .tv-player-name { max-width: 100px !important; font-size: 1.1rem !important; } .tv-hp-bar { width: 100px !important; } .tv-action-log { width: 350px !important; } .tv-center-info { left: 15px !important; padding: 0.75rem 1rem !important; } .tv-turn-number { font-size: 2.5rem !important; } .tv-turn-timer { font-size: 1.25rem !important; } } @media (max-width: 900px) { .tv-player-info, .tv-opponent-info { width: 400px !important; min-width: 400px !important; max-width: 400px !important; gap: 0.5rem !important; } .tv-action-log { width: 300px !important; right: 10px !important; } .tv-center-info { left: 10px !important; padding: 0.5rem 0.75rem !important; } .tv-turn-number { font-size: 2rem !important; } }
